name: Gizmo's Feast
description: This Game is made for the Icat Game Jam 2020... Goal of the game is to feed all the creatures called Gizmos in a level.. Gizmos can control objects but they cant bring it towards them... That means what you see is not you get ... so Gizmos should work as a team to feed each other in the game... Feel really free to press the restart button if the game got stuck into any bugs....
